meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Sodding! I can't believe I missed the bus again!
meanings.sent2: She was so sodding angry when her phone died during the call.
meanings.sent3: Well, sodding great, now I have to redo the entire project.
meanings.sent4: The sodding rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: I was sodding furious when I found out they canceled the concert.
